db:insert.db:sql: insert into eticket (movie_id,movieTitle,duration,price,discounted_price,seatNo) values ((SELECT movie_id from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), (SELECT movie_name from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), (SELECT duration from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), (SELECT price from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), (SELECT (price - discount) from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), (SELECT available_seats from seatInventory where show_name = :movie_name and available_seats>0) );

db:select.db:sql: select max(ticket_number) AS Your_Ticket ,movieTitle,duration,discounted_price,seatNo from eticket where movieTitle = :movie_name

db:bulk-insert.db:sql: insert into eticketBulk (movie_id,movieTitle,duration,discounted_price,ticket_holder) values((SELECT movie_id from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), (SELECT movie_name from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), (SELECT duration from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), (SELECT (price - (price*0.05)) from movies WHERE movie_name = :movie_name), :ticketHolder )

db:select.db:sql: SELECT * from eticketBulk ORDER BY ticket_number Desc LIMIT :number
